paragraph: Eric Watson (born July 5, 1955) is an American jazz pianist. He was born in Wellesley, Massachusetts. In 1978, he moved to Paris after graduating from the Oberlin Conservatory of Music in Oberlin, Ohio. Watson is signed to a long-term recording contract with ACT Records. Watson has worked with doublebass player John Lindberg, drummer Ed Thigpen, and Steve Lacy.
